title: Mind Your Manners
overview: Have you ever wondered how to elegantly cutâ€¦ a banana? Mind Your Manners follows world-renowned etiquette teacher Sara Jane Ho as she helps her students become their best selves and put others at ease, using the language of manners and etiquette. Get ready to laugh, cry, and learn a thing or two as Sara transforms her students' lives and helps them acquire the confidence to shine in any situation - starting with a sensible spot of afternoon tea. Pinkies in or out?
